description: At Langdon Education Campus, we serve students in preschool through 8th grade in a learning environment that promotes the acquisition of valuable knowledge and skills and serves as a foundation for each student to progress successfully through all educational levels. Our curriculum consists of a traditional course of study with a focus on science, technology, engineering and math (STEM), which makes education and careers in the sciences more accessible for our students. We foster an ongoing exchange of ideas and resources for our students, parents and educators to achieve our goals.
transit: 84 (Rhode Island Ave-New Carrollton Line), 86 (College Park Line), B8 (Fort Lincoln Shuttle Line), H6 (Brookland-Fort Lincoln Line), T18 (Annapolis Road Line)
